name: The white bird's dreams
description:
The white bird's dreams

This is a 3D actin game.

The faceless bird defeats monsters and collects feeds.

There are 3 stages in total.

Conditions for the death penalty.

⑴Defeat 7 of the 8 monsters

⑵Collect 5 out of 6 feeds in total

Collecting 6 feeds will result in a short ED. (Only one type.)

*remark*

I’m sorry...

①I couldn't create latter half of stage 2 well.

②There are some difficult points to interpret if you are not Japanese.

③The brightness of the game changes depending on the computer you use. I'd like you to adjust the brightness of the computer display.
